entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make Type.IsPrimitive a JIT intrinsic (and JIT time constant) #95929
  • Enable Remaining Libraries Tests in TestReadyToRun Pipeline #95928
    9.0.0
  • Large unmanaged memory growth (leak?) when upgrading from .NET 6 to 8 #95922
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Limit PNSE in `HybridGlobalization` #95921
  • FileVersionInfo.ProductMajorPart, FileVersionInfo.ProductMinorPart, FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart are not set in NET8 #95919
  • [API Proposal]: Make ZipArchiveEntry.CompressionMethod public #95909
  • Add public copy constructors for HTTP header collections #95912
  • [API Proposal]: Support of secured value decryption configuration options #95899
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 4 Regressions on 12/7/2023 9:32:35 PM #95926
  • Allow specifying `JsonConverter` attribute annotations on properties of unsupported type. #95893
    Future
  • .Net 7/8 failed to fork process at Linux #95890
  • Failures in x86 coreclr pgostress #95887
  • Reachable assert in ECDiffieHellmanCng #95886
    9.0.0
  • Split Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration API surface and interop source generator API surface into more assemblies #95885
  • [RFC] Is ```System.StringComparer.Compare(object? x, object? y)``` Implemented Correctly? #95884
  • Generate strings instead of Roslyn SyntaxNodes in interop source generators #95882

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: An extension method similar to "enumerate" or "withIndex" in other languages #78156
  • .NET Breaking Change - ActivatorUtilitiesConstructorAttribute doesn't work after upgrade to .NET 8 #95915
  • Trimmer/AOT compiler issues warnings but they are not shown and publish is successful. #95932
  • Tracing for dynamic assembly loading? #12743
    Future
  • A way to know if a method is overridden #12760
    Future
  • net9.0-ios-Release-arm64-NativeAOT_Release-OSX.13.Amd64.Iphone.Open leg failing without running tests #95875
  • Current EventPipe asserts on StackFrameIterator when collecting gcdumps from nativeAOT apps #95599
    9.0.0
  • Current EventPipe asserts on StackFrameIterator when collecting tracing from nativeAOT apps #95606
    9.0.0
  • [iOS] CultureInfo.DisplayName only shows abbreviation #95427
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Create an optional job for HybridGlobalization on CI #95282
  • [mono][wasi] add ilgen component tasks to wasi #95874
    9.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953.cmd #95843
  • Checked/Release asm diffs failure: Assertion failed 'compiler->compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(HWIntrinsicInfo::lookupIsa(intrin.id))' #95081
    9.0.0
  • 9 Regressions in PerfLabTests.GetMember #93741
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] Tasks: Delete temp files #95938
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] More filtering in EnumGcRefConservatively #95937
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add EventBuilder implementation #95936
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [NativeAOT] Delete unused class DirectPInvokePolicy #95935
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Compute new dominators earlier and invalidate old dominators #95925
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • macOS: Set certificate as a dependency of private key handles #95924
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Use `ArrayStack` instead of linked list for loop work list #95923
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CX_4A group #95918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Further clean up loop alignment placement #95917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix 16 byte stack alignment in asm helpers. #95916
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [NativeAOT/Apple] Map the thunks using vm_allocate/vm_remap #95914
    os-ios, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Sockets: update tests for Linux 6.6 fix. #95913
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • [aot][browser] Stop throwing in CultureInfo getter #95910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [wasi] Add build support for using `wasm-opt` #95900
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix calculation of channel bindings hash in managed NTLM implementation #95898
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Use workstation GC in outerloop NativeAOT libs runs #95896
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot]use string interpolation when generating c #95894
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [GC] Reduce volatility in DATAS heap count adjustments #95888
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [PERF][Release/7.0] Add newer container for performance Android testing #95883
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Revert "Build tests as self-contained for native AOT" #95880
    NO-MERGE, needs-area-label

Merged

  • Fix some BBF_NONE_QUIRK cases #95931
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix BBJ_COND-related assert in OptIfConversionDsc::IfConvertDump #95934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update BasicBlock flag dumping in `dspFlags` #95930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] rename WasmApp.* to BrowserWasmApp.* #95892
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump #95816
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix assert in BaseBucketParamsManager #95911
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] [tests] Disables tests on Apple mobile platforms #95861
    Servicing-approved, os-ios, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.x
  • [mono][wasm] Move some runtime code to a separate runtime.h/runtime.c… #95834
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Error out if SelfContained is not specified for Native AOT publish" #95881
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [doc] HybridGlobalization, add not supported APIs #95920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • JIT: Invalidate loop table after unrolling and dominators after MarkLocalVars #95854
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add Vector128.EqualsAny simd intrinsic #95901
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization fix localized DisplayName and LanguageName #95786
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Enable ETW::GCLog::ForceGCForDiagnostics thread to be walked by the GC #95837
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • [mono][wasi] Remove some obsolete #ifdef-ed code. #95889
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] Minimal legacy support for Blazor renderBatch #95869
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] enable finalizer thread, run most tests in threadpool #95783
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix OSR DFS assert, and update entry BB for try regions #95871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix runtime-wasm-perf failing on PRs #95895
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: clear loop iter info after rebuilding loops for opt repeat #95879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use 'compOpportunisticallyDependsOn' to determine if we can use ArmBase_Arm64_MultiplyLongAdd/MultiplyLongSub/MultiplyLongNeg intrinsics in lowering #95877
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Avoid a few array allocations with DefaultBinder (#93115)" #95872
    area-System.Reflection

Updated

  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • GT_STORE_BLK - do not call memset for blocks containg gc pointers on heap #95530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix JitDisasm in release build #95502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Remove loop-related VN quirks #95729
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Provide More Detailed Information in System.TypeLoadException for Incorrect MethodImplAttribute Marking #95833
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix null reference exception in ilverify #94988
    area-Tools-ILVerification
  • Re-add Stack Overflow handling in NativeAOT with larger alternate stack #95808
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser][fix] maxParallelDownloads #95870
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Build fixes for Bionic on x64 #95382
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix ILLink/ILC hang when tracking too many hoisted local values #95302
    Servicing-consider, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Improve the hash function used in the `InstMethodHashTable` #95285
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 120.0.6099.71, windows: 120.0.6099.71 #95832
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Make sure LOHThreshold less than region_size #95485
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • [NO-MERGE][WIP] Testing Swift interop CI lines #95699
    NO-MERGE, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use multi-reg load/store for EncodeToUtf8 #95513
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Timespan int overloads #95779
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Update the place where we assert about `align` presence while removing jump to next instr #95845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers by enlarging `lock` region #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Replaced string concatenation by StringBuilder usage #95760
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [browser][mt] dynamic thread create #95702
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [API Implementation]: CngProperty constructor with ReadOnlySpan<byte> overload #93805
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add CFG build for EventPipe enabled #95721
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • WIP: Testing iOS library mode with NativeAOT on CI #94999
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM][Question] import wasm modules #2457

PullRequests

Merged

  • [Async-2]: Tasklet aging #2425
    area-async
  • Add Stream boilerplate source-generator and attribute #2185

Updated

  • [NativeAOT LLVM] Integrate dotnet.js into ILCompiler.LLVM #2453
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet publish` fails intermittently on macOS with "error code -10" and no additional information #37472
  • Cannot publish to an output folder with commanin the path e.g. "c:\temp\publish .NET6, C#\" #37470
  • `dotnet tool update` skips NuGet package signature verification #37469
  • The "GenerateStaticWebAsssetsPropsFile" task failed unexpectedly #37456
  • dotnet-tools.json: add path to project installed tool #37450

Closed

  • Publish need user to download .NET runtime after upgrading from .NET 7 to 8 #37005

PullRequests

Created

  • Add SkipGetTargetFrameworkProperties to redist.csproj #37471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37466
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `--framework` option to restore command #37459
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add -f alias for framework option to list package command #37448
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • [release/8.0.2xx] Containers support was moved higher to enable creating image of CLI apps #37335
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #37384
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #37430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #33697] New standalone `info` command #36943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions #5354
    12.0
  • namespace internal access modifier #2497
  • Can't use C# 8.0 using declaration with a discard #2235
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add "Metadata" section to params-collections.md #7761

Updated

  • Add a design question to collection-expressions.md #7749

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Code fix for IDE0028 produces invalid collection expression #71240
  • IDE features don't work with collection expressions + target-typed new #71238
  • MetadataImageReference.Display is used in diagnostics and has localizable resources #71236
    Backlog
  • `IDE0300` is reported twice #71234
  • Version 4.9.x packages missing on Nuget Gallery #71226
  • "Implement abstract class" should add the right generic constraint when a parameter is covariant in T? and constrained to be a subtype #71225
  • Elide MemoryMarshal.ToEnumerable when spread in a collection expression #71223

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34412.76 #71239
  • Switch to file-scoped-namespaces in generated syntax files. #71192
  • Unexpected CS8602 generated in local function after update to VS 17.8 #70856
    17.9
  • When will this be fixed? It is extremely annoying! #71231
  • Wrong handling of readonly field in ref struct which holds another ref struct #71144
  • C# formatting rules should have a "do not enforce" option #71218
  • IDE0055 triggered on no space after spread operator #71219
  • Collection expressions: align `ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind()` with conversions specification #70880
    17.10
  • Compiler is too strict with its requirements for collection-expression code-gen when targeting an interface. #71054
  • ExtractMethod and VerifyTextSync failing on latest scouting queue updated to 17.9 P1 #71088
    17.9 P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Pass in helixApiAccessToken when available #71235
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Restore using dotnet CLI to ensure NuGet environment variables are used #71233
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use NetCurrent instead of net8.0 #71229
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Params Collections: Implement language version check. #71228
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Use compile-time expression for SkipApplyOptimizationData in yml #71221
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Only apply one document info change for linked documents #71220
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Restore using dotnet CLI to ensure NuGet environment variables are used #71237
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix BuildHost in Source Build #71215
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Create a Razor language server cohosted in Roslyn #70819
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use file scoped namespaces #71193
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove methods not used by F# #71232
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Start local function analysis with captured variables marked "not null" #71148
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, Next
  • Don't copy test results to helix upload root. #71212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Loosen compiler restriction which was not required by the spec #71110
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, Next
  • Enable skipped tests (rename and extract methods) #71213
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix infinite loop in tagging #71224
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove navigation helpers based on line+offset #71184
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix option code #71222
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Collection expressions: align ConversionsBase.GetCollectionExpressionTypeKind() with spec #70975
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce size of source constructor symbol #71178
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Collection expression spread optimization #71195
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Run Spanish tests on CoreClr #67748
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not resolve diagnostics early during attribute binding #71140
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesize singleton list type for IEnumerable<T>, IReadOnlyCollection<T>, IReadOnlyList<T> #71147
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • API proposal for an IndentingStringBuilder. #71163
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add GetDeclaredSymbol overload for LocalFunctionStatementSyntax #71169
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Split integration test build from test run #71166
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update status/details on implicit indexers in object initializers #71164
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Allow collection expressions with `CreateCompilation` #71134
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged
  • Cache ROS constructed from arrays of constants (remaining types) #69820
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • WIP: Testing insertion cost. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use new helper type for initializing a value type field only once, and in a threadsafe manner. #71013
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Rename automatic restore requests to be more explicit #71104
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix Code Actions not applied when LSP editor is enabled #71077
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add OrchardCore test to OptProf config #69909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NavigationManager In Blazor Web App Throws Exception On Form Post #52777
  • Perf regression: json #52774
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #52773
  • Blazor: Scoped Services are disposed when circuit is closed when using some (but not all) components in a WebAsembly #52772
  • ASP00023 fails on multiple `HttpGet("[action]")]` #52770
  • Build in AuthenticationStateProviders from Blazor Web templates #52769
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Blazor] Support serializing render fragments from SSR #52768
    Planning: WebUI
  • ExceptionHandler middleware mutes http_server_request_duration_seconds_count metrics on exceptions #52766
  • Are there any plans to provide runtime for 'linux-bionic-arm64'? #52764
  • Calling external .dll fails after upgrading to .NET 8 #52761
  • DefaultHttpResponse throws null ref when trying to access StatusCode (inside the AspNetCore library) #52760
  • Blazor 8 InteractiveServer : newly created cookie not available in second pass of MainLayout.razor #52759
  • Hot reload becomes very slow on Ubuntu with Blazor #52757
  • Avoid NRE in HttpContext debugger display with empty feature collection #52756
  • Blazor 'System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException' on .NET 8 #52755
    8.0.x
  • Blazor custom elements third-party embedded integration is very difficult to use. #52754
    Planning: WebUI

Closed

  • After update from .net6 to .net8 - first time CheckPasswordAsync will cause an exception if user is loaded with AsNoTracking #52602
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #52690
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #52691
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52692
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcvanilla #52693
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #52694
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #52696
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #52697
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #52698
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcvanilla #52699
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #52700
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #52701
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #52702
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla #52703
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot #52704
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, single_query #52456
  • Visual Studio 17.8 (Angular and ASP.NET Core Template fails on creation #52049
  • Blazor Server - HubFilter - Identifying called method #52555
  • Blazor WebAssemblyHostBuilder initialization fails if root component's assembly is not loaded on client startup #26601
    8.0.1
  • Blazor Server Side AADB2C AllowAnonymous Not working in latest template #39321
    8.0.0
  • MissingMethodException occured when deploying Blazor Server app with 'Trim Unused code' #40033
    Planning: WebUI
  • Improve prerendering and authentication experience in Blazor #27592
    Planning: WebUI
  • Ability to add rendermode to blazor layouts #52709
  • Allow multiple root components and/or render modes to be registered in Blazor Web Apps #52631
  • Blazor RenderTreeBuilder avoid boxing and strings allocations #52655
  • I Just Wonder If net8.0 Blazor Webassembly Can Be Decompiled #52712
  • .NET 8 Blazor Error 404 after upgrading from .NET 6 #52710
  • "Error: Cannot advance beyond the end of the Sibling array" appears when streaming rendering subcomponents #52371
  • [Blazor] Unnecessary Html comments in the script tag #52435
  • Set < routes@rendermode= "Interactive Server" / > how to set the component to static rendering mode #52503
  • Blazor Net 8 interactive auto <NotFound> not triggerd #52660
  • Blazor 8 InteractiveServer : cascading parameter passed from App to MainLayout is null during second pass #52758
  • Blazor Webassembly Authentication with OpenIDConnect endsession missing id_token_hint #43563
    Planning: WebUI
  • Angular 17 - SpaServices.Extensions - Wrong regex #52325
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #52695
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #52716
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #52742
  • Theme: JS Frontends with .NET Backends #47254
    8.0.0
  • Error unprotecting the IdentityServer signing key with kid {kid} #51839

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52767
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix Blazor enhanced form bugs #52765
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Remove Microsoft.SourceBuild.Intermediate from prebuilt baseline #52667
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Retry BlazorWebTemplate_IndividualAuth_LocalDb #52737
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix metrics duration and http.route tag with exception handling #52652
    area-hosting
  • #52067 input number range type #52747
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add ForgotPasswordRequest to STJ source generation context #52714
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Make user in ValidateAsync nullable #52604
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Add s390x support to the runtimearchitecture list #52722
    community-contribution, area-hosting, area-networking
  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Use CreateAsyncScope instead of CreateScope for ExceptionHandler middleware #52687
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Add null check for connectionId #52672
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Add endpoint metadata to developer exception page #52668
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, area-middleware
  • signalr `DefaultDisconectTimeout` typo #52599
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Add ShortCircuitAttribute #52571
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • Make ValueStopwatch readonly #52496
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [blazor][wasm] Dispatch rendering to main thread (Net9) #52724

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Switch contol ignores OnColor and ThumbColor #19380
  • Not able to update CollectionView header #19379
  • Events triggered unexpectedly #19378
  • [Testing] Replace uses of Wait with an implementation that fails when the condition is never true #19376
    Backlog
  • App crash when is started from another app. #19374
  • Resizetizer not cleaning up after image files are deleted #19373
    Backlog
  • Group headers randomly disappear on iOS When updated #19372
    Backlog
  • TranslationX/Y Changes Won't Be Applied to Bounds In AbsoluteLayout #19368
  • [Windows] - Publish on store failed with Payload contains two or more files with the same destination path 'LibMobile.pdb' #19367
  • If ListView IsEnabled is false, items and PullToRefresh are still enabled #19366
  • DEP0700 ERROR - Registration of the app failed. App manifest validation error... #19364
  • SwipeView Rendering issues #19363
    Backlog
  • The size of the assembly varies between .NET 7.0 and .NET 8.0. #19362
  • WPF Blazor cannot be started at boot. Error: There is no content at #19359
  • .NET MAUI CarouselView Items Not Visible in Release Mode #19357
  • The colors in MAUI application are wrong #19356
  • The page of a book is opening wrong angle. #19355
  • Crash when using Picker while also using UIDeviceFamily 6 #19354

Closed

  • [IOS] Maui .NET 8 The app has been terminated when start debugging #19358
  • .NET MAUI Blazor NavigationManager.Refresh() causes a flicker of a white page #18993
  • [iOS] Keyboard stays open when tapping outside of an entry #19375
  • TableView: ViewCell with Picker disappears when updated (on Android) #19321

    Backlog
  • Custom ViewCells disappear in TableView #10322

  • Android TableView's ViewCell won't calculate height correctly #12989
    Backlog
  • When checked on, switch in table view button in ViewCell is invisible in Android Platform #13006
    Backlog
  • TableView cells disappear when cells are updated on Android #16533
    Backlog
  • Add API to configure scope validation for dependency injection #18519
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [UITest] AutomationId not being set in Shell Tabbar #19328

  • Alert not shown in OnAppearing method #19369

  • Fix test SearchBarHandlerTests.BackgroundInitializesCorrectly on iOS #13693

  • Mac/iOS: Clipping prevents from catching events in the background #17218

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to remove children when DeleteBehaviour is set to NoAction? #32596
  • ComplexProperty and OwnsMany/AutoInclude #32595

Closed

  • .NET Core CLI add migration command inconsistently using wrong DbContext constructor #27963
  • Add-migrations fails when order of constructors isn't correct #28004
  • Create an empty file migration in Illegal character filename in add-migration #24024
    9.0.0
  • ComplexProperty & ValueGenerator #32550
  • Custom IdGenerator is not being used #24120
  • Compiled model and SQLite in EF Core error #32592
  • EF Core does not report types it failed to load from migration assemblies #19691
    9.0.0
  • Update ApplyConfigurationsFromAssembly to call non-public constructors #24748
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Pass 'OBJECT' to sp_rename when renaming a table or sequence #32599
  • [release/8.0] Improve the relationship cycle breaking logic to detect cycles even when not starting on one. #32598
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • Update developer docs for building packages and using developer build config #32597

Merged

  • Fix relationship cycle breaking logic in CSharpRuntimeModelCodeGenerator. #32593
  • Fix some API docs #32594
  • Validate scaffolding migration file names #32589
  • Generate more information when failing to load EntityTypeConfiguration types #32577

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Ensure that, by convention, dependent properties have the same element type as principal properties #32582
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Fix splitting migrations SQL by GO #32572
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Make proxies thread-safe accessing a navigation once loaded #32547
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Fix Contains within SQL Server aggregate functions #32543
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.2
